text.0: may the god savitar rich in goodly treasures filling the region borne by steeds come hither.
text.1: in his hand holding much that makes men happy lulling to slumber and arousing creatures.
text.2: golden sublime and easy in their motion his arms extend unto the bounds of heaven.
text.3: now shall that mightiness of his he lauded even sūrya yields to him in active vigour.
text.4: may this god savitar the strong and mighty the lord of precious wealth vouchsafe us treasures.
text.5: may he advancing his farspreading lustre bestow on us the food that feedeth mortals.
text.6: these songs praise savitar whose tongue is pleasant praise him whose arms are full whose hands are lovely.
text.7: high vital strength and manifold may he grant us preserve us evermore ye gods with blessings.
